ingredients.ingredient: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix

cookingTips: Bring cream cheese to room temperature for easy mixing and smooth texture
Roll the cheese ball in nuts just before serving to maintain crispness
Chill for at least 2 hours or overnight for easier handling and better flavor development
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you modify this appetizer to enhance the Italian flavors?
